nodes.text: The Tykannin Turbines 3-2-XR was a repulsorlift sled armed with a light blaster cannon. It was often used by the Galactic Empire to patrol and travel between important facilities.
The 3-2-XR was detailed in Changing the Balance. It is suggested that the Rebel team is discovered by a patrol or steals a vehicle for their own use after arriving at Draenell's Point.
